title: The Future of Home Health Care
itunes:title: The Future of Home Health Care
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, discusses the second wave of COVID-19. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Businessweek P&I Reporter Michael Smith share their insight on life and death on the Zaandam, Holland America’s pariah ship. Helen Adeosun, CEO of CareAcademy, talks about the future of home health care amid COVID-19. And we Drive to the Close with Bruce Bittles, Chief Investment Strategist at Baird.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
